description:
Avatar the Last Airbender has been cursed with a Netflix live action remake. Last time we covered Sozin's super Big Brained plan to sneak attack the Airbenders. This time we'll go over another fresh addition to the series lore: Fire Nation resistance fighters attempting to pull off a poorly thought out Operation Valkyrie on Fire Lord Ozai.

If you liked this check out my main channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz1fTbwui7o5aDZ6W1dOLTQ

#netflix #avatarnetflix #avatarthelastairbendernetflix  #avatarthelastairbender
title: Why Netflix Avatar is Garbage Part 2: Ozai’s Hilarious Death Plot!
